lead_paragraph: The heavily recruited high school quarterback Terrelle Pryor will announce where he will attend college at a news conference Wednesday.Pryor, from Jeannette High School near Pittsburgh, was ready to sign a letter of intent with Ohio State at a news conference Feb. 6, the first day of the national signing period for football recruits. He decided at the last minute to delay his selection. His father, Craig, said he wanted him to take more time to consider attending Penn State. Pryor said his final choices were Ohio State, Michigan, Penn State and Oregon.
